price: 15. Waa sida kuwii iyaga wax yar ka horreeyey7. Waxay dhadhamiyeen cidhib xumadii arrinkooda, waxayna leeyihiin cadaab xanuun badan.
arabic: كَمَثَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ قَرِيبٗاۖ ذَاقُواْ وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهِمۡ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
footnotes: 7. Waa Yahuuddii reer Banuu Qaynuqaac ee horay iyaguna looga raray Madiina.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kamathali alladhīna min qablihim qarīban dhāqū wabāla amrihim walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
